message.content:
{"id": "116744", "title": "Bug 116744 - Dynamic text content type has no effect", "description": "When using a dynamic text element to display the contents of a database field with three types of content: 
1) HTML text within <html> tags. 
2) HTML fragments not within <html> tags. 
3) Text with Rich Text Format (RTF) tags, the content type specified for the dynamic text element does not have any effect.", "OB": "The dynamic text element should display the content of the database field based on the specified content type.", "EB": "The dynamic text element is not displaying the content of the database field according to the specified content type.", "SR": "To resolve this issue, the dynamic text element should respect the content type specified for the database field and display the content accordingly. The HTML text within <html> tags should be rendered as HTML, the HTML fragments not within <html> tags should be treated as plain text, and the text with RTF tags should be rendered with the appropriate formatting."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '116744', 'title': 'Bug 116744Dynamic text content type has no effect', 'description': '', 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'I have a db field with three types of content:1) HTML text within <html ...</html tag.2) HTML fragments not within <html tag3) Text with RTF tagsI use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field. '}
